CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"No leak"),0, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Non urgent weeping visible leak"),1, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Network non visible leak"),2, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Private non visible leak"),2, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Water Quality Issue non-visible leak"),2, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Dangerous apparatus (site made safe)"),2, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Non-visible leak losing <17L per minute / 1m3/hr"),2, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Flow Alarm non-visible leak"),2, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Poor supply non-visible leak"),3, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Non-visible leak losing >17L per minute / 1m3/hr"),3, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Dangerous apparatus (site unsafe)"),3, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Poor supply visible leak"),4, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Network visible leak"),4, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Non-visible leak losing >85L per minute / 5m3/hr"),4, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"No supply visible leak"),5, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"No supply non-visible leak"),5, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Flow Alarm visible leak"),5, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSM_TypeofLeakValue__c,"Urgent visible leak"),5,0))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Type of Leak Score
